description:
Triple Dutch is a Dutch-themed game, containing three innovative puzzle games. The games are based on windmills, flowers and cheese. Rotate windmills, move flowerbeds and slide the cheese to the exit... can you solve all 100 puzzles?

Triple Dutch features:
three games in one, 
100 puzzles in total, 
normal and expert mode, 
three secrets to unlock, 
optional tilt control (cheese game), 
editor for each game, 
automatic save-game.
